description: Episode number 2 of Series "Science". Stresses the part food plays in the development of the human body. Illustrating with varius food types, the film explains the meaning of such terms as calories, proteins and vitamins and how to obtain sufficient of these for correct diet. The film concludes with five simple rules for healthy living.
